From now on, you and your heirs shall have full and unfettered enjoyment of the property as per the schedule. Neither I nor my heirs shall have any rights or liabilities whatsoever. sections.content:
The property covered under Sale deed No. 4227 of 2025, dated 08/Dec/2025, executed by Gurram Viswanath in favour of Gurram Thirupathi Naidu, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 110.50 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 1-88, Assessment No. 188, comprised in survey number 424/1A, situated in Garladinne Gramapolam, Panchayath and Mandal, within the District of Anantapur, registered at sub-registrar office Pamidi, is bounded as follows:

North by: House Of Govindamma
South by: House Of Adinarayana
East by: House Of Adi & Rastha
West by: Vacant Site Of S.C. Ranganna
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note:It is noted that the Survey Number handwritten in the Deed and hence the same may be verified by obtaining a Certified Copy from the concerned SRO, before proceeding to the loan process. Therefore, it is advisable for the F.I. to verify the same and proceed as per its internal policy. Further It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
